form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: ST. hart container corp., 155 east la jolla ave. placentia, california 92670 ( (714) 630-4410

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 ST. HART CONTAINER CORP. 155 EAST LA JOLLA AVE. PLACENTIA, CALIFORNIA 92670 (714) 630-4410 November 10, 1978 To Whom It May Concern: St Hart Container Company will permanently employ Santiago Aguayo Jauregui for a trainee as a slitter operator, at $3.50 per hour, in our plant. Presently Mr. Jauregui brother is residing at 24211/2 Reppetto Ave. , Montebello, California, and working at St Hart Container Company as a permanent employee. Sincerely Yours, Anhue theren Aykal Sheran General Manager AS:cj
